title: OAuth Login Success for Each Provider
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate via Kakao, Naver, Google, and Apple OAuth providers, with correct session persistence after app restart.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to the login screen.
Select Kakao OAuth login and complete authentication.
Verify successful login and that user is navigated to onboarding if new, or home dashboard if existing.
Restart the app.
Verify session is persisted; user remains logged in.
Logout and repeat steps for Naver OAuth login.
Repeat steps for Google OAuth login.
Repeat steps for Apple OAuth login.

title: Email/Password Signup and Login Flow
description: Validate signing up with valid email and password, error handling for invalid or duplicate emails, and login flow with session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to signup screen.
Input valid email and password, complete signup.
Verify account creation success and navigation to onboarding.
Logout and navigate to login screen.
Attempt login with correct email/password.
Verify login success and navigation to home dashboard.
Restart app and verify session persistence.
Attempt signup with an invalid email format.
Verify appropriate validation error message is shown.
Attempt signup with an email already registered.
Verify duplicate email error message is shown.

title: User Onboarding Profile Input Validation and Saving
description: Verify multi-step onboarding with name, birth info, gender, and MBTI selection accepts valid inputs, validates invalid inputs, and saves to profile for personalized fortune generation.

steps.description: Start onboarding after first login.
Input valid name and proceed.
Name accepted; next step displayed.
Input invalid birth date (e.g., February 30) and verify validation.
Validation error displayed; cannot proceed.
Input valid birth date and valid birth time.
Select gender and optional MBTI from provided options.
Complete onboarding.
Verify user profile data is saved and used to customize fortune results.

title: Home Dashboard Cards Rendering and Swipe Functionality
description: Check the home dashboard loads 11 different swipeable fortune cards with daily updated content based on user profile, verifying smooth swiping navigation and data accuracy.

steps.description: Login as a user with completed profile.
Verify home dashboard loads with 11 different fortune cards.
Verify each card displays personalized fortune data accurate to user profile.
Perform swipe left and swipe right gestures on the cards.
Cards switch fluidly without lag or rendering errors.
Restart the app and verify dashboard data updates daily and persists.

title: Fortune Input Validation and AI Result Generation Performance
description: Test all 30+ fortune types input forms accept valid inputs, reject invalid inputs with error messages, and generate AI-based results within 15 seconds performance benchmark.

steps.description: Navigate to fortune list.
Select a representative fortune type with required inputs (e.g., traditional saju).
Enter valid inputs and submit.
Verify AI-generated reading is displayed within 15 seconds.
Enter invalid or missing inputs.
Verify form validation prevents submission and displays appropriate errors.
Repeat for other fortune types including tarot, MBTI, compatibility, career, health, and love.

title: Premium Content Access and In-App Purchase Flow
description: Verify that premium content is blurred initially, purchases correctly unlock premium content, and token balances update immediately with server receipt verification.

steps.description: Access premium fortune content section as a non-premium user.
Verify premium content is blurred and access is restricted.
Navigate to purchase screen and buy a premium subscription or token package.
Verify purchase completes successfully with server receipt verification.
Verify premium status is updated and locked content is unlocked immediately.
Verify token balance on user profile and token widget updates accordingly.
Access premium content again and verify full accessibility.

title: Profile Management Edit and Data Persistence
description: Verify users can view and edit their profile data, including saju details and fortune history, and settings changes persist across app restarts.

steps.description: Navigate to profile screen.
View current profile information and saju details.
Edit profile fields such as name, birth info, and gender.
Save changes.
Verify updated data is reflected immediately.
Navigate to fortune history.
Verify history records are accurate and load correctly.
Modify app settings like notification preferences.
Restart the app.
Verify profile edits and settings persist after restart.

title: Error Handling on API Failures and Input Errors
description: Test graceful handling of API failures in fortune generation, payment verification, and profile saving with user-friendly error messages and retry options.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or API timeout during fortune generation.
Verify user receives informative error message and option to retry.
Simulate failed receipt verification after in-app purchase.
Verify purchase failure is communicated clearly and user balance is not updated.
Attempt profile data save with invalid inputs.
Validate input errors are shown preventing save.
Force app crash or restart during critical process, verify data is not lost or corrupted.

title: Security Validation for OAuth, Payments, and Data Protection
description: Ensure OAuth authentication tokens are securely stored and invalidated on logout, payments go through secure receipt verification, and user data is encrypted at rest and in transit.

steps.description: Authenticate with each OAuth provider.
Verify tokens stored securely in session and cleared completely on logout.
Perform a purchase flow and intercept network traffic.
Verify receipt data is transmitted securely and only valid receipts update user status.
Check database or local storage to verify sensitive user data is encrypted.
Confirm all network APIs use secure HTTPS endpoints.

title: Performance Testing: Launch Time and Fortune Generation
description: Verify that app launches within 3 seconds on supported devices and all fortune AI results generate within 15 seconds as per performance targets.

steps.description: Launch the app on distinct supported platforms (iOS, Android, Web) under normal network conditions.
Verify time from launch to home screen visible is under 3 seconds.
Request AI-generated fortune reading for multiple fortune types.
Verify each reading returns results within 15 seconds.

title: Navigation and Deep Link Functionality
description: Test in-app routing and navigation using GoRouter, validate bottom navigation bar functionality, and deep link support for over 100 routes.

steps.description: Start app and navigate through all major sections using the bottom navigation bar.
Verify each section loads correctly without errors.
Enter deep links manually or simulate external links targeting specific app pages (including fortunes, profile, premium).
Verify app routes to correct page with accurate state and data.
Verify back navigation and shell route behavior maintain expected app navigation state.

title: Interactive Features Accessibility and Functionality
description: Verify dream interpretation, fortune cookie, psychology tests, and worry bead features are accessible, allow valid input, and generate appropriate outputs.

steps.description: Navigate to interactive features menu.
Select dream interpretation and input valid dream description.
Verify meaningful interpretation result is displayed.
Access fortune cookie feature and request fortune.
Verify fortune cookie displays varied fortunes randomly.
Complete a psychology test with valid answers.
Verify test result matches inputs and shows useful insights.
Use worry bead feature and verify interactive experience functions without errors.
